item.title: 罗氏寻求与特朗普政府直接对话，减免美国关税
item.description: 瑞士制药商罗氏公司正在通过直接谈判向美国政府申请进口关税豁免，理由是其运往美国的产品被其出口的美国产药品和诊断产品所抵消。【原文：Swiss drugmaker Roche is petitioning the U.S. government in direct talks for import tariff exemptions, arguing the products it ships into the United States are offset by its exports of U.S.-made drugs and diagnostics.】

item.title: 第一季度销售额降幅超过预期，开云集团股价下跌 5.42
item.description: 周四开盘，开云集团（Kering）股价下跌 5.42%，此前该公司公布的第一季度销售额低于分析师预期。【原文：Shares of Kering dropped 5.42% at market open on Thursday, after the company reported first-quarter sales that came in below analysts' expectations.】

item.title: 中国商务部就关税影响与外企举行会谈
item.description: 中国商务部周四表示，已与80多家外国在华企业和商会举行会议，讨论美国加征关税对外国企业在华投资和经营的影响。【原文：China's Commerce Ministry said on Thursday that it had held a meeting with more than 80 foreign companies and chambers in China to discuss the impact of U.S. tariffs on investment and the operation of foreign firms in the country.】

item.title: 解说：中国正在限制矿产出口。中国的出口管制制度是如何运作的？
item.description: 中国一直在加强对矿产开采和提炼的控制，将清洁能源、芯片制造和国防所必需的金属列入出口管制清单，扰乱了全球供应，导致价格飙升。【原文：China has been flexing its control over the mining and refining of minerals by adding metals essential for clean energy, chipmaking and defence to its export control list, disrupting global supply and sending prices soaring.】

item.title: 外国汽车制造商销量下滑，保时捷在中国也找不到方向
item.description: 在今年的上海车展上，在中国的外国汽车制造商面临着一个日益紧迫的挑战--在其国内竞争对手以迅猛的速度生产华而不实、价格低廉的电动汽车的同时，如何重新赢得中国买家的青睐？【原文：Foreign automakers in China face an increasingly urgent challenge at this year's Shanghai auto show - winning back Chinese buyers while their domestic rivals churn out slick, affordable electric vehicles at a relentless pace.】

item.title: 英国贝尔福比蒂公司获得德克萨斯州 8.89 亿美元高速公路合同
item.description: 英国建筑和基础设施集团 Balfour Beatty 周四表示，它已从得克萨斯州交通部获得一份价值 8.89 亿美元的合同，用于重建 30 号州际公路的部分路段。【原文：British construction and infrastructure group Balfour Beatty said on Thursday it had secured a contract worth $889 million from the Texas Department of Transportation to reconstruct part of Interstate 30 highway.】

item.title: 联合利华第一季度基本销售额增长超出预期
item.description: 联合利华（Unilever）周四公布的第一季度基本销售额增长超出预期，并重申了 2025 年全年业绩展望。【原文：Unilever beat estimates for first-quarter underlying sales growth on Thursday and reaffirmed its full-year 2025 outlook.】

item.title: 沃尔沃汽车任命弗雷德里克-汉森（Fredrik Hansson）为新任首席财务官
item.description: 总部位于瑞典的沃尔沃汽车公司周四表示，已任命弗雷德里克-汉森（Fredrik Hansson）为新任首席财务官（CFO）。【原文：Sweden-based Volvo Cars said on Thursday it had appointed Fredrik Hansson as new chief financial officer (CFO).】

item.title: 斯托龙斯基增持超过 25% 的股份，Revolut 利润飙升至 15 亿美元
item.description: Revolut公司周四表示，由于这家金融科技公司在加密货币交易浪潮中乘胜追击，并从利率和卡费中赚取了更多利润，该公司去年的税前利润激增149%，达到11亿英镑（约合14.6亿美元）。【原文：Revolut's pretax profit surged 149% last year to 1.1 billion pounds ($1.46 billion) as the financial technology firm rode a wave in crypto trading and earned more from interest rates and card fees, the company said on Thursday.】

item.title: 日本投资者上周转为海外债券净买家
item.description: 在截至 4 月 19 日的一周内，日本投资者成为海外债券的净买家，因为美国债券市场在本月早些时候的大幅下挫后有所回升。【原文：Japanese investors were net buyers of overseas bonds in the week through April 19, as U.S. bond markets recovered somewhat after a heavy selloff earlier this month.】

item.title: 惠誉 "密切关注 "韩国如何应对地缘政治挑战
item.description: 全球信用评级机构惠誉表示，它正在 "密切 "关注韩国在中美全球贸易战中如何应对地缘政治挑战。【原文：Global credit ratings agency Fitch said it was "quite closely" watching how South Korea manages geopolitical challenges amid a global trade war between the United States and China.】

item.title: 为应对关税，现代汽车将途胜 SUV 的生产从墨西哥转移到美国
item.description: 现代汽车公司（Hyundai Motor）周四表示，为应对美国关税，该公司已将途胜（Tucson）跨界车的生产从墨西哥转移到美国。【原文：Hyundai Motor said on Thursday that it has shifted output of its Tucson crossover from Mexico to the United States in response to U.S. tariffs.】

item.title: 瑞典胡斯克瓦纳公司因北美需求疲软未达盈利预期，首席执行官将卸任
item.description: 瑞典胡斯克瓦纳公司（Husqvarna）周四公布的第一季度营业利润低于预期，受北美需求疲软、货币逆风和价格下跌的影响，公司首席执行官帕维尔-哈伊曼（Pavel Hajman）表示他将下台。【原文：Sweden's Husqvarna reported first-quarter operating profit below expectations on Thursday, hit by soft demand in North America, currency headwinds and lower prices, while CEO Pavel Hajman said he would step down.】

item.title: 德国财长：与美国达成协议仍是关税争端中的首选方案
item.description: 德国财政部长周四在接受电台采访时说，德国仍希望欧盟能与美国达成协议，降低进口关税，但如果协议失败，德国支持采取反制措施。【原文：Germany still hopes the European Union can find agreement with the United States to bring about a reduction in import tariffs but supports counter-measures if this fails, the country's finance minister said in a radio interview on Thursday.】

item.title: 意法半导体称 2025 年第一季度为谷底，预计第二季度会更好
item.description: 意法半导体（STMicroelectronics）周四公布的第一季度财报符合预期，并称这是今年的底点，因为该公司认为第二季度的业绩会更好。【原文：STMicroelectronics reported first-quarter earnings in line with expectations on Thursday, calling it the bottom point for the year, as it sees a better second quarter.】

item.title: 诺基亚发布季度利润不佳报告，强调特朗普关税带来的干扰
item.description: 诺基亚周四公布的第一季度利润远低于市场预期，并表示美国关税将对其第二季度利润造成短期干扰，预计影响在2000万至3000万欧元之间。【原文：Nokia reported first-quarter profit well below market expectations on Thursday, and flagged a short-term disruption from U.S. tariffs with an estimated impact of between 20 million and 30 million euros to its second-quarter profit.】

item.title: 中央电视台报道：中国央行行长在华盛顿会议上表示，中国支持自由贸易
item.description: 据中国中央电视台报道，中国央行行长周三在华盛顿表示，中国将坚定支持自由贸易规则和多边贸易体系。【原文：China will firmly support free trade rules and the multilateral trading system, the country's central bank governor said on Wednesday in Washington D.C., state broadcaster CCTV reported.】

item.title: 诺和诺德在 Wegovy 的推动下连续上调销售指引的辉煌业绩可能即将终结
item.description: 自 2021 年推出大受欢迎的减肥药 Wegovy 以来，诺和诺德每年都会多次上调年度销售指导。【原文：Since launching its wildly popular weight-loss drug Wegovy in 2021, Novo Nordisk has raised its annual sales guidance several times a year.】

item.title: 罗氏第一季度销售额因药物 Phesgo 和 Vabysmo 而增长 7
item.description: 瑞士制药商罗氏公司周四称，受乳腺癌药物 Phesgo、眼科药物 Vabysmo 和过敏治疗药物 Xolair 的推动，其第一季度销售额增长了 7%，增幅超出预期。【原文：Swiss drugmaker Roche said on Thursday its first-quarter sales rose a forecast-beating 7% driven by breast cancer drug Phesgo, eye drug Vabysmo and allergy treatment Xolair.】

item.title: 现代汽车第一季度营业利润增长 2
item.description: 现代汽车周四公布的第一季度营业利润增长了 2%，这得益于韩元走软，以及美国消费者在关税之前提前购买。【原文：Hyundai Motor reported a 2% rise in first-quarter operating profit on Thursday as it benefited from a weaker South Korean won and as U.S. consumers frontloaded purchases ahead of tariffs.】

item.title: 法国巴黎银行第一季度利润大幅增长，达到预期目标
item.description: 法国巴黎银行（BNP Paribas）公布的第一季度盈利符合预期，这得益于其投资银行销售额的增长，尽管全球贸易战导致经济前景恶化，但该行仍坚持盈利预期。【原文：France's BNP Paribas reported first-quarter earnings in line with expectations thanks to rising sales at its investment bank, and stuck with its profit forecasts despite a deteriorating economic outlook prompted by a global trade war.】

item.title: 雀巢第一季度有机销售额超出预期
item.description: 雀巢公司周四公布的第一季度有机销售增长好于预期，因为这家全球最大的包装食品公司提高了其 Kit-Kat 巧克力威化饼和雀巢咖啡的价格。【原文：Nestle posted better-than-expected first-quarter organic sales growth on Thursday as the world's biggest packaged food company hiked prices for its Kit-Kat chocolate wafer bars and Nescafe coffee.】

item.title: 软件公司达索系统下调 2025 年利润率展望
item.description: 法国软件公司达索系统（Dassault Systemes）周四以风险调整后的财务前景为由，下调了年度营业利润率预期。【原文：French software company Dassault Systemes lowered its annual operating margin forecast on Thursday, citing a risk-adjusted financial outlook.】

item.title: 雷诺第一季度收入略有增长
item.description: 法国汽车制造商雷诺周四公布的第一季度收入增长了 0.6%，略高于预期，这得益于该公司最近推出的一系列新产品。【原文：French carmaker Renault reported a 0.6% rise in first-quarter revenue on Thursday, slightly ahead of expectations, as it benefited from a flurry of recent new launches.】

item.title: 研究显示，菲律宾将受益于美国关税调整，但必须解决制约因素
item.description: 一项新的研究表明，菲律宾将受益于美国针对全球贸易流动的全面关税改革，因为菲律宾是受美国新的进口关税影响最小的东南亚经济体之一。【原文：The Philippines stands to benefit from a sweeping U.S. tariff overhaul that has disrupted global trade flows, a new study showed, as the country emerges among the least exposed Southeast Asian economies to new U.S. duties targeting imports.】

item.title: 消息人士称，金佰利斥资 40 亿美元收购的国际卫生纸业务部门将展开三方并购战
item.description: 东南亚的皇家金鹰公司（RGE）和亚洲浆纸业公司（APP）以及巴西的 Suzano SA 是金佰利国际生活用纸业务的最终竞标者。【原文：Southeast Asia's Royal Golden Eagle (RGE) and Asia Pulp & Paper Co (APP), as well as Brazil's Suzano SA are the final bidders for Kimberly-Clark's international tissue business valued at around $4 billion, four people said.】

item.title: 台湾提议再提供 100 亿美元援助以应对美国关税
item.description: 台湾总理周四提议再支出 100 亿美元作为特别预算，以帮助台湾经济应对美国关税的影响。【原文：Taiwan's premier on Thursday proposed another $10 billion in spending as a special budget to help the economy deal with the impact of U.S. tariffs.】

item.title: 机器人出租车制造商 Pony.ai 认为特朗普的贸易战打击了市场情绪和海外扩张计划
item.description: 中国机器人出租车开发商Pony.ai公司周四表示，美国总统唐纳德-特朗普与中国的贸易战可能会抑制其国际扩张计划，但预计对其供应链的直接影响不大。【原文：China-based robotaxi developer Pony.ai Inc said on Thursday that U.S. President Donald Trump's trade war with China was likely to dampen its international expansion plans, but it anticipated little direct impact on its supply chain.】

item.title: 丰田 3 月海外销量创历史新高，美国买家在关税前抢购一空
item.description: 丰田汽车（Toyota Motor）周四表示，由于美国4月初开始征收进口关税，北美市场的采购量激增，该公司3月份的海外销售额创下历史新高。【原文：Toyota Motor said on Thursday that its overseas sales in March touched a record high for the month, fuelled by a surge in North American purchases ahead of U.S. import tariffs that came into effect in early April.】

item.title: 新加坡高收益股票因关税引发的避险情绪而上涨
item.description: 随着美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的关税政策在整个市场引起反响，投资者越来越倾向于新加坡的高收益、防御性公司，包括电信公司，而不再青睐银行等老牌公司。【原文：As reverberations from U.S. President Donald Trump's tariffs are felt across markets, investors are increasingly gravitating toward Singapore's high-yield, defensive companies, including telecom firms, pivoting away from old favourites such as banks.】
